sections.general: owner/attorney and mediator executive profile as an attorney for over 25 years, i have helped individuals and businesses all over northern ohio build futures, primarily in the areas of contracts, divorce mediation, elder care, employment, estates, family law, probate, property law, trusts, & wills. skill highlights leadership/communication skills skilled divorce mediator human resources estate planning & taxes negotiations expert legal research & writing expert core accomplishments * awarded $100,000 from gund and cleveland foundations to initiate cuyahoga county juvenile court's custody mediation program serving diverse, never married parents.
